Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.
